about_the_game:
In the distant future, the last living humans in the universe have sent back a cyborg to Old Earth. Your job is to clone and portal back humans birthed from long ago buried cloning machines. It will be up to you to find these buried machines and lead these newly cloned "citizens" safely back to the portal to New Earth. You will need to mine into Old Earth and create hazard free tunnels to help New Earth meet it's Population Goals!

Features

  • Mine into many different biomes to find 100's of unique artifacts.
  • Use different materials to build safe tunnels and lighting to assist citizens back to the portal ship.
  • Use artifacts to craft helpful tools and drones, each with their own abilities.
  • Discover the truth behind New Earth and the demise of Old Earth.
  • Help citizens avoid biome specific destructive creatures and traps.
  • Build the Oasis and help these new citizens thrive.
  • Earn Steam Achievements as you play.

This DEMO is the introductory level

short_description: Mine, discover, and build to help your newly cloned citizens avoid traps and enemies on their way to the New Earth portal. Create safe pathways through many different biomes in this lemmings-like puzzle strategy game, on your way to meeting your Population Goals!
